conjurer:BeastEye.FLAVOR: The murky violet iris writhes as if alive.
conjurer:BeastEye.NAME: Beast Eye

conjurer:CelestialDew.NAME: Celestial Dew

conjurer:CleansingBell.FLAVOR: It seems to have a life of its own, even as you hold it in your hand...
conjurer:CleansingBell.NAME: Cleansing Bell

conjurer:ConcertsFinalHour.NAME: Concert's Final Hour

conjurer:CrimsonMapleLeaf.NAME: Crimson Maple Leaf

conjurer:CrimsonwhorlBubbletear.NAME: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear

conjurer:Dendroculus.NAME: Dendroculus

conjurer:EntropicDie.NAME: Entropic Die

conjurer:Everamber.NAME: Everamber

conjurer:FortuneGlue.NAME: Fortune Glue

#gNext #gDebuff: {0}
